verbs.description: < p > [V: Looking] [ARGM-DIR: back] , there were two kinds of people who lived in America in 2016 : people who believed Donald Trump , and people who believed data.</p >
< p > [ARGM-ADV: Looking back] , there [V: were] [ARG1: two kinds of people who lived in America in 2016 : people who believed Donald Trump , and people who believed data.</p] >
< p > Looking back , there were two kinds of [ARG0: people] [R-ARG0: who] [V: lived] [ARGM-LOC: in America] [ARGM-TMP: in 2016] : people who believed Donald Trump , and people who believed data.</p >
< p > Looking back , there were two kinds of people who lived in America in 2016 : [ARG0: people] [R-ARG0: who] [V: believed] [ARG1: Donald Trump] , and people who believed data.</p >
